sentences.en: Build a quarry and then a stonemason.
Lucius got apprenticed to a stonemason.
sentences.cn: 卢修斯成了石匠的学徒。

sentences.en: One thinks of Amos the sheepherder, Socrates the stonemason, Omar the tentmaker .
sentences.cn: 想想牧羊人阿摩司，石匠苏格拉底，帐蓬制造人奥马尔。

sentences.en: Stonemason Bates said, Stone's my life.
sentences.cn: 石匠贝茨说, 石头就是我的生命.

sentences.en: The son of a stonemason, born around 469BC, Socrates was famously odd.
sentences.cn: 他是一名石像雕刻师的儿子，大约出生于公元前469年，苏格拉底因他的古怪而出名。

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is cutting stone into pieces to be used in buildings
